name: tvclmod

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, ctvc), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c0, ctlm))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ TopVec, c0 ∈ LMod, c0 ∈ TopMod)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctvc), wcel(c0, clmod))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctvc), wcel(c0, ctlm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c0, clmod))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopVec → c0 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopVec → c0 ∈ TopMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMod → c0 ∈ LMod)

-| wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c0, clmod))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopVec → c0 ∈ LMod)

⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMod → c0 ∈ LMod)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctvc), wcel(c0, clmod))

cumulated.pretty:

comment: A topological vector space is a left module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
